tool_description: Consolidates and tracks delivery status across all notification channels, providing unified reporting and alerting for failed deliveries.

order_id.description: Order ID to track notifications for

delivery_ids.description: List of delivery IDs from various notification services

check_interval_minutes.description: How often to check delivery status (in minutes)

max_checks.description: Maximum number of status checks before timeout

error_messages: Invalid order_id: Order ID must be a non-empty string
Empty delivery list: At least one delivery ID must be provided
Invalid check_interval: Check interval must be between 1 and 60 minutes
Invalid max_checks: Maximum checks must be between 1 and 100
Status check failed: Unable to retrieve status for one or more deliveries
Timeout exceeded: Maximum number of status checks reached without completion
usage: Provide order_id and array of delivery_ids from notification services. Optionally configure check_interval_minutes and max_checks. The tool monitors and reports on delivery progress.

total_notifications.description: Total number of notifications being tracked

pending_deliveries.description: Number of notifications still pending delivery

delivery_summary.description: Summary of each delivery attempt with status and channel
